events.message: I placed an order last week but my package still hasn’t arrived. The tracking hasn’t updated for several days and I’m worried there might be a delay.
The case has been reviewed and categorized under Delivery Delay due to reported slow shipping and lack of tracking updates.
Your case has been assigned to a customer service representative who will assist you with your delayed delivery.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about your delayed shipment. I’m here to help track your package and get this sorted out for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address? This will help me check the exact status of your delivery.
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 456 Maple Street, Springfield, IL.
I’ve checked with the courier and it seems there is an unexpected delay in your area. We expect your package to arrive within 3 business days. We appreciate your patience.
Thanks for the update. I understand the delay now and will wait a little longer before contacting you again.
Your package has been successfully delivered today. Thank you for your patience and please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We wanted to check in after your recent delivery to ensure everything arrived as expected and that you are satisfied with your purchase.
Since your issue has been resolved, we are closing the case now. Please don’t hesitate to reach out in the future if you need further assistance.
